Humane Technology with Genevieve Gaudet 🙋🏽 🙋🏽‍♂️

Feb 14, 2019

  • civictech
  • episode
  • policy
  • privacy

We talk with Genevieve Gaudet Senior Designer at (Nava)[https://twitter.com/NavaPBC]. The conversation focuses around the idea of humane tech and how it interacts with the social safety net. You don’t want to miss it.
